lines.text: Weird things a-goin', weird things a-comin', weird things a-happenin' 'round here!
What's wrong? Paul!
I don't know. It's like a nightmare. It was a nightmare. I was running in the streets... doing "things".
Mr. Niles, I just found out that Count Dracula was a faggot!
Huh, Is that so?
Hey, you don't have to believe me but that's the facts!
Wuur-wilf? You mean Joel thinks this thing is a wuur-wilf?
Whatcha got there?
Silver Bullet!
Huh! Me Too!
I was just praying for the police! I think we should call the cops!

[after surviving a confrontation with Paul the Werewolf, to the audience]
I'm the good guy!

[Standing almost perfectly still a few feet from the werewolf]
What's going on? Oh my God! Help me!
[Still not moving away]
Holy Jesus God Father! Werewolf? Oh, no! Save me! This thing is a werewolf!
[is finally attacked]

[totally flat and lifeless]
This is absolutely fascinating...
What are you hiding from me, Noel? Tell me the truth!
In due time, you'll know everything.
Well, maybe then it's too late!
They can also tell when a man is Yalloglanchie. He takes on a series of strange body habits, like sleeping like a coyote, nose to anus. The house begins to smell like coyote urine.
Look Yuri, What the hell is wrong with you? I suggest you stay out here and get sober before you rejoin the party and when you do your gonna apologize to Natalie! Now go take a walk!
[walks away]
Yeah, I'll take a walk!
[gives a disgusted look at the camera]

Uh, no, sir, a lot has changed. If you stick around you'll find out for yourself! Just the other night, half-man, half-beast got shot down! They took 'em to the hospital he's in a coma! The Police are investigating, its been all over My radio!
Do you always greet people with a gun in your hand?
What this? This is just to keep the flies down! There's some weird things happening around here!
Where the hell have you been? Do you know what time it is? Where the hell is Tommy?

[spits]
Here we go again.
Hey I'm talking to you!
Look man! Tommy's at City Emergency Hospital He's sick!
Yeah he's turning in...
[Joel motions Bill to be quiet]
He's real sick!
What's wrong with him?
He got an infection from that thing he got cut on yesterday, that's all I know. Now if you don't mind I'd like to get back to work.
Good!
What's going on here? Oh my god? Help me? Holy Jesus God Father?
So it all comes to this? You and Noel is in it for fame and fortune? But over my dead body! You hear me? I won't stand for it!
He's bad.
How bad is he?
Bad-bad.
